story:
The Carry On Project was created by the band, Loose Change, on the 10th anniversary of 9/11 as a response to reports of ongoing health care issues faced by first responders who rendered aid on that tragic day.   As we approach the 11th anniversary of that tragic day, the needs of these brave men and women remain.

On 9/11/2011, Loose Change released the song, Carry On, in support of the Fealgood Foundation, an organization that is dedicated to addressing the health care needs of the 9/11 first responders.  We would like your assistance in helping to raise at least $1,000 in support of the Fealgood Foundation.  We're excited to help.  How about you?
story_txt:
The Carry On Project was created by the band, Loose Change, on the 10th anniversary of 9/11 as a response to reports of ongoing health care issues faced by first responders who rendered aid on that tragic day.   As we approach the 11th anniversary of that tragic day, the needs of these brave men and women remain.
On 9/11/2011, Loose Change released the song, Carry On, in support of the Fealgood Foundation, an organization that is dedicated to addressing the health care needs of the 9/11 first responders.  We would like your assistance in helping to raise at least $1,000 in support of the Fealgood Foundation.  We're excited to help.  How about you?

story:
We provide comfort and support to families dealing with Craniosynostosis by making blankets for the kids to snuggle after surgery.

After my son Thomas had surgery July 13th 2011 I knew I needed to help other families. I watched Thomas for over a week with swollen eyes and not being able to see get comfort from his "monkey" blanket by rubbing it.

Each donation will be greatly appreciated and will help send a "snugglie" to other Cranio families!

Please visit our website to learn more.

http://thomascraniocomfortsnugglies.webs.com/

 

What is Craniosynostosis?

Craniosynostosis (from cranio, cranium; + syn, together; + ostosis relating to bone) is a condition in which one or more of the fibrous sutures in an infant skull prematurely fuses by ossification, thereby changing the growth pattern of the skull. Because the skull cannot expand perpendicular to the fused suture, it compensates by growing more in the direction parallel to the closed sutures. Sometimes the resulting growth pattern provides the necessary space for the growing brain, but results in an abnormal head shape and abnormal facial features. In cases in which the compensation does not effectively provide enough space for the growing brain, craniosynostosis results in increased intracranial pressure leading possibly to visual impairment, sleeping impairment, eating difficulties, or an impairment of mental development combined with a significant reduction in IQ.

Craniosynostosis occurs in one in 2000 births. Craniosynostosis is part of a syndrome in 15 to 40% of the patients, but it usually occurs as an isolated condition. It is important that families seek out the opinion of a Pediatric Craniofacial Physician who has experience with craniosynostosis for proper diagnosis, surgical care, and followup.

The infant's skull consists of the metopic suture, coronal sutures, sagittal suture, and lambdoid sutures. The metopic suture is supposed to close between three to nine months of age. The lambdoid, sagittal and coronal sutures are supposed to close between 22 to 39 years of age.

Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Craniosynostosis

story:
Organization Summary

My name is Eugene Aiken and I am the President of the RPI Rugby Alumni Association (RRAA). I would first like to thank you for visiting our donation page!  You can make a big difference in my organization by helping us achieve our fundraising goal!!! Every little bit helps. Let me tell you a little bit about the RRAA.

Mission: Primarily this association will strive to contribute ideas and opportunities that will enhance the relationship between alumni and active players while creating favorable environments for successful fundraising efforts to support the RPI Rugby Football Club. Secondarily our mission is to create a lifelong community of RPI Rugby alumni players by providing opportunities to play, sweat, and bleed with former teammates. 

Short-term Goals (<3 years): 

- Facilitate and enhance communication between actives and their alumni

- Coordinate and promote events which will increase alumni and active interaction, including but not limited to attending rugby tournaments 

- Provide alumni with relationships and opportunities that will help them make contributions of immediate value and need 

 Long-term Goals (>3 years): 

- Create a concrete network of RPI Rugby alumni and actives 

 - Facilitate reconnecting with old teammates and professional networking to enhance alumni relationships 

 - Host various fundraising and networking opportunities to allow those alumni no longer in direct contact with RPI Rugby to provide their support 

 - Work to increase finanacial and logistical support from RPI to support both the Men’s and Women’s active teams. 

Our goal is to be able to provide our Active Undergraduate Club (RPI Rugby Football Club) with a brand new Scrum Sled to replace the current one which is in an epic state of disrepair.  We as Alumni are extremely passionate about being able to procure this for our undergraduate club.  Just like any Alumni support organization, we strive to be able to provide the very best equipment and opportunities to our undergrads so that they may represent our beloved club and Alma Mater in the best way possible.  Because of this we wish to purchase a Scrum Sled that matches their caliber of play and dedication.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here is what lead to our decision:

Choices, Choices and More Choices: The Scrum sled market is pretty saturated. There are a lot of options out there. Sleds ranged from the basic model that we all know and love to machines that move on their own, are hydraulically powered, and tell you how hard you engaged (Set for all you young players). These machines range from $2000 to $15,000. So we had plenty of options to weigh when making our choice.

Our Criteria for a Sled: When picking a sled we came up with a list of 5 things that we felt would benefit the undergraduate club long term and solved some of the issues the old sled had

  1. Vertical Pads, each moving independently. All of our previous sleds fell short here. This allows the sled to mimic the real feel of a scrum more accurately
  2. Grips located for props to practice correct binding technique.
  3. Ability to upgrade the sled with new and improved parts. Plus this allows us to continue to give to club
  4. Available Cover. Since I can remember the scrum sled was always left to the elements. With a sled being such an important investment a way to protect it was important.
  5. MADE IN THE USA

 

Our Choice:  After doing a lot of research and talking to some different clubs we determined the best option would be the Rhino Premier Sled. It matched all of our criteria and it provided excellent value at its price point. It has become the sled of choice for all levels of rugby.

The total price of the sled we chose is $5500.  We have already been able to secure a few donations so realistically we are looking to raise another $3000. Any and all funds donated through this site will go directly toward the purchase of the  new Scrum Sled.

So you may be asking yourself "What's in it for me if I donate to your cause?", some really cool RPI Rugby apparell thats what.  The donation perks we are offering are as follows:

Donations of $50 or more will receive an RPI Rugby Pint Glass!!! (while supplies last)

Donations of $500 or more will receive a customized RRAA Rugby Jersey!!!

 

The Impact

Providing this sled will make a big impact on my organization and on the undergraduate club in a few distict and profound ways.

  • This sled will give our new players a safe way to learn how to properly scrum, ultimately reducing injuries
  • The updated design of the proposed sled will give our undergraduate club a competitive advantage by allowing them to practice more advanced scrumming and mauling techniques and game strategies
  • It allows my organization to helpful fulfill its mission of providing equipment and support to the undergraduate club
  • Fundraisers like this allow us to be able to contribute to other organizations that support injured or paralyzed rugby players such as the Michael Jones Living Trust

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Since we are trying to cast as wide a net as possible, please share our fundraising initiative with your friends and family. We are greatful for any donations received. EVERY LITTLE BIT HELPS!!!


Also please feel free to share our initiative on your social networking sites (Facebook, Twitter, Etc.) by using the Indiegogo share tools!!!

Please visit www.rpirugbyalumni.com to find out more about our organization!

Thank You again from all of us in the RRAA!!!

I would first like to thank you for visiting our donation page!  You can make a big difference in my organization by helping us achieve our fundraising goal!!! Every little bit helps. Let me tell you a little bit about the RRAA.

Mission: Primarily this association will strive to contribute ideas and opportunities that will enhance the relationship between alumni and active players while creating favorable environments for successful fundraising efforts to support the RPI Rugby Football Club. Secondarily our mission is to create a lifelong community of RPI Rugby alumni players by providing opportunities to play, sweat, and bleed with former teammates. 

Short-term Goals (<3 years): 
- Facilitate and enhance communication between actives and their alumni
- Coordinate and promote events which will increase alumni and active interaction, including but not limited to attending rugby tournaments 
- Provide alumni with relationships and opportunities that will help them make contributions of immediate value and need 
 Long-term Goals (>3 years): 
- Create a concrete network of RPI Rugby alumni and actives 
 - Facilitate reconnecting with old teammates and professional networking to enhance alumni relationships 
 - Host various fundraising and networking opportunities to allow those alumni no longer in direct contact with RPI Rugby to provide their support 
 - Work to increase finanacial and logistical support from RPI to support both the Men’s and Women’s active teams.

Please visit www.rpirugbyalumni.com to find out more about our organization!

story:
Hi, i'm Hugo! Im transgender, which means Im a dude born in a chicks body.Im now taking medical steps to help me escape my female body so I can live as the guy I was always ment to be. Im starting male hormones in two months from now. Hormones will give me a deep voice, a more masculine physique and facial hair, but sadly i wont grow a penis and my man boobs won't magically fall off. :(

I am currently saving up for top surgery( surgery to remove my female breasts) Because you know..what kind of guy wants boobs? This surgery costs 6'500, I now have 2'000 saved up at the moment. Being only 18 years old and working at a fast food chain resturant, getting enough money for this surgery Is taking me a very long time. As you can imagine, being a guy trapped in a girls body isn't always easy, everytime I get dressed, or look in the mirror im forced to see my female chest. Most guys are privileged to be born with a body that matches their mind, but for me I wasnt so lucky.

Not only will getting this surgery FINALLY allow me to look in the mirror with a smile on my face, but it will also allow me to live more comfortably. I'll finaly be able to go to the beach shirtless, something I only dreamed of doing since I was five years old. No longer would I be self conciecous worrying if people can see my hidden female chest, which I bind daily using a binder (a very tight compression shirt) or worrying everytime someone hugs me or taps me on the shoulder if they felt it. This surgery would help give me the confidence I need to go out in the world and live my life to its full potential. 

Waiting for this surgery is very hard for me, which is why im trying to raise the money needed. Any amount no matter how BIG or how SMALL I would be forever thankful for..Words can't express my gradtitude and appreciation for any help given! Even spreading the word by sharing my video would help me loads! 

Thank you very much! - Hugo Landry

story:
I NEED DESPERATE HELP! 

Let me just be honest with you I am a truck driver that has been out of work since 19Dec12 in hospital and most recently I am under the care of home health nurse and a primary care doctor as well as a wound care doctor and a neurologist. It is uncertain even now as to if I will be able to return to work or be listed as disabled permanently. I am running out of my savings as the months pass and no income. My family can't really help because of their situations, so I’m reaching out and hoping I’ve put out enough good karma to get some back. All I can say is thank you and please spread the word. igg.me/at/thecajundso I am currently at a loss as what to offer for perks so if you have any ideas plz feel free to email me at thecajundso@hotmail.co.uk but know that everyone that gives a dollar or a thousand will be getting prayers and thoughts from me and again thank you so very much.

story:
Short Summary

The Let Go... Let Peace Come In Foundation was founded in 2008 by Peter S. Pelullo.  A survivor himself, Pete recognized that while there are many organizations scattered throughout the US to help children who experience sexual abuse there are no real resources for adults to help them heal from their childhood sexual abuse trauma.

Since its inception the organization has worked to provide a platform for survivors to find their voice and share their stories via the foundation's website www.letgoletpeacecomein.org.  It has also aligned with the number one public health school in the world to support pioneering intitatives focused on prevention, early intervention, research, and access to a higher quality of care for survivors.

Child sexual abuse is more common than you think and it can occur within the family or by individuals outside the home.  1 in 3 girls and 1 in 4 boys will experience at least one sexual violation before the age of 18.  

It only takes one time---one sexual violation to change the life course of a survivor.  The long-term emotional and psychological damage resulting from child sexual abuse can be devastating to survivors and those who care about them most.

By supporting the Let Go... Let Peace Come In Foundation you will be saving lives.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Currently the foundation is working on all fronts to raise more than $3 million to support its prevention, intervention, research, and care initiatives.  This social funding campaign is one component of an overall funding strategy aimed at bringing healing, recovery, and scientific knowledge to the survivor community. 

In addition to the changing the world through knowledge and the prospect of revolutionizing the public policy landscape thanks to our alignment with the number one public health school in the world, the foundation also directly subsidizes trauma therapy treatment for adult survivors who do not have the means or adequate insurance to begin their own healing process.

The Let Go... Let Peace Come In Foundation was the only organization to reach out to and offer treatment to the young men affected by the perpetrations of Jerry Sandusky.  Two of the young men who testified in court received therapy subsidies from the foundation for counseling and a third young man who did not testify as part of the original grand jury preceedings is also currently receiving subsidy assistance from the foundation for his therapy sessions.  All three of these young men have expressed their gratitude for the support and care that the foundation has provided them.  One of them is featured in the campaign video clip above.

Contributors who donate at least $500 will received a signed copy of Peter S. Pelullo's book Betrayal and the Beast: A true story of one man's journey through childhood sexual abuse, sexual adiction, and recovery.  In his memoir Pete reveals his own sexual violations as a child and describes how for 48 years he lived a disconnected double life rife with addictions in spite of his professional success.

 

The Impact

With more than 60 million survivors existing the in US today and millions more across the globe each of us know a survivor and we probably know more than one.

These survivors are not just the downtrodden people living on the margins of society they are also successful business people, parents, and even adult children who have never spoken about their violations, but continue to exist in a life that could at a moments notice be triggered by a smell, a sound, a situation, or even the development of their own child.  Without organizations like the Let Go... Let Peace Come In Foundation that provide a voice for those who have been silenced these individuals will struggle in a society that expects them to just "get over it".  

The ubiquitous nature of child sexual abuse increases the possibility that our children, grandchildren, nieces, and nephews will marry someone who has experienced sexual abuse in their lifetime.  The time to stop the cycle is now.

Since 2010 the foundation has raised enough funds to subsidize therapy sessions for 15 survivors in four states, but we need to do more.  On average one therapy session with a qualified trauma therapist costs about $100.  With your support we can help "one survivor at a time".  Additionally we have also raised more than $200,000 toward the advancement of prevention, intervention, research, and care efforts.  

More information about who we are, what we do, and how you can make a difference can be found on our website at www.letgoletpeacecomein.org

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Survivors...

Openly acknowledging what happened to you is the first step in reching out for the help you need.  As a community we can heal and become emotionally, mentally, and physically healthy adults.

 

Friends...

With your support we can continue providing services and conducting the scientific research needed to identify the causes of these tragedies.  Together, we can help alleviate child sexual abuse.

 

If you are unable to donate funds to our cause we understand.  Donations of time and professional services are always welcomed.  If you are a survivor please consider lending your voice to the foundation's website.  Your courage will be an inspiration for a survivor who has not yet found their own voice.

And please, even if you are unable to contribute use the Indiegogo share tools to share this link with your friends in your network so we can begin to have dialog about healing and moving forward....together.

If you prefer to mail a donation to our organization contributions can be made to:

Let Go... Let Peace Come In Foundation

630 W. Germantown Pike, Suite 180

Plymouth Meeting, PA 19462

story:
What do you mean by "train"? 

       When I say train I'm refering to anything from rolling on the mats in jiu jitsu to jogging and lifting weights. Pretty much just being physically active. It's what's always defined me, always been my outlet, always been what I was passionate about. 

The surgery, the symptoms, the cost and why not Canada, eh?

      The procedure I’m fundraising for is the endoscopic surgical removal of a pineal cyst.This operation has the power to give me my life back. For the last 5 and a half years I’ve had to stop all physical activity due to debilitating, headaches, dizziness, balance and coordination problems. As an athlete words alone can’t explain how devastating this has been. Doctor’s in Canada don’t have the ability to do the surgery the minimally invasive way. That said, although I’d do it in a heartbeat, they won’t perform the more risky open procedure. Initiallly the surgery was going to take place in LA, but now there's a more afordable (100,000) option that I'm  looking into in Australia under Dr. Charles Teo. 

How bad do you want it? (The motivation behind “Tattoo’s To Train”)

      If you have a dream you have to battle for it. I've always believed in that and I’ve always said I’d do anything to make this surgery happen. Anything for a shot at training again, for a shot at competing again. Saying it’s just words though. This idea is that avenue to prove it. If you guys are willing to commit to me I’m more then willing to commit to you by getting your initials and depending on the donation your name tattooed on me. For me It’d be an honour to carry everyone who helped me through this time into every battle, every athletic endeavor I undertake when this is all said and done.

How’s all this going to work?   

       The first session is going to happen January 19th, Jory Helmes of Bully Boy Tattoo Inc in Duncan B.C. is going to be doing it. I'll keep going in for every 50 people after that. Thought to start things off on one side of my chest/upper arm then take it from there. If you guys add me on facebook I’ll tag everyone in each segment as it happens.

 

      Before I dive into the perks I want to just let everyone know that as cliche as it is, big or small everything is appreciated. Whether its a step or a leap, everything is forward movement. Everything and everyone is part of making a miracle happen. That’s a special thing.

 

       From 1-19 dollars you get this guys gratitude, positive energy and a message. Not that a message is a perk, I think anytime you donate to someone no matter how big or small you should get thanked. For every 10 people who donate 20 dollars I’ll do a random one person draw for the initials tattoo. If you’re willing to donate 50 dollars the initials are a guarantee. From there if you’re fortunate enough and willing, or if a family wants to rally together and donate 500 dollars I'll get your last name done. If you donate 1000 dollars the name’s a done deal, you’ve done a truly remarkable thing and at the very least that’s what I can do to show the appreciation.

Know your fighter

     Through this situation I’ve used a certain analogy over and over again. I’m passionate about the combat sports so to me it makes sense to treat this as another competition, another fight in a way. Everyone who helps is in my corner, a truly essential aspect of this. Without you I’d crumble. However before cornering, before training someone, you want to know who they are and what they’re all about. Know they deserve your expertise, know they’ll battle hard and not fold up when adversity sets in, know their heart. Please check out my site  www.submitacyst.com to learn more about me. It has far more information on the situation. Feel free to add me on facebook and fire me a message. You can also email me at curt_knippelberg@hotmail.com. I’ll do whatever it takes to earn your trust and support in this.

Thanks for taking the time to look at this. 

Big Love

You can also email me at curt_knippelberg@hotmail.com. I’ll do whatever it takes to earn your trust and support in this.Thanks for taking the time to look at this. 
Big Love

story:
My name is Biljana Dotlic, I'm Lara's mother.
 
For 9 years, since she was prematurely born, we are struggling to make her life easier and les painful.
 
This campaign has a goal of collecting funds for one of her surgeries in Russia(the only place with this unique surgery), and the rehabilitation that needs to follow.
 
Your contributions can give Lara a new hope, to develop and grow healthier and with les pain, your little can be huge for her!
 
We need 5000 USD, that would make it possible to go to Tula, Russia, have a surgery, go to spa rehabilitation upon return and pay for daily treatments
 
In order to grow as well as possible she needs one surgery in Russia a year. After each surgery follows  long period of costly rehabilitation. She needs tutors for maths and language, because she can't follow the school curriculum like the rest of her classmates

There are some unique perks.

If we don't reach the goal, all the money collected will go to the cause nevertheless, but we shall try to compensate the rest from other sources

This is a story about a girl which, beside all hardships that she faces in her life, loves life and enjoyes it!

Lara was born prematurely in 29th gestation week, almost three months earlier than she was supposed to.
For three months she was in the neonatological hospital in an incubator.
As a consequence she has cerebral paralysis, bronchial asthma and epilepsy.
Her eye sight is also damaged from the oxygen in the incubator.
Right side hemiparesys doesn't allow her to grow up equally, so she needs to have surgical interventions once a year to allow her right body side to develop as equally as possible to the left side.
Those surgeries are performed in Tula, Russia and have to be paid.
This way we are trying to collect the money for her surgeries and treatments that need to follow them
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOU HELP!!!
 
This is Lara's Facebook page, where you can find out all the details:
 
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Larina-prica-Laras-story-by-Biljana-Guzina-Dotlic/113759208791557?sk=info
 
this is a video Lara's friends from the foundation made for her campaign:
 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=Xcg7tuSup3M

 

I realise that not everyone can contribute financialy, but your help in spreading the word amoung your friends and colegues would be as much appreciated!

feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

THANK YOU ALL FOR SPARING YOUR TIME FOR THIS CAUSE!!!

 

ZA UPLATE U DINARIMA

BR. NAMENSKOG DINARSKOG RAČUNA

205-9011004008990-04

Komercijalna Banka ad Beograd

LARA DOTLIĆ

story:
The Michigan what?

We are the University of Michigan's quidditch team! Since Fall 2010, we've bonded over a love of Harry Potter, athletics, and defeating our enemies in wizard duels.
 
We were fortuante enough to qualify for this years Quidditch World Cup, but we need your help to get ourselves to Kissimmee, FL! The trip is a pricy one, and as of now we're paying almost all of it out of pocket.
 
 
 

Wait, you play what now?

We play quidditch. An internationally played, full contact adaptation of J.K. Rowling's fictional sport. More information can be found below or at the IQA's website: internationalquidditch.org.

 

How else have you fundraised?

We've been hard at work raising money for this since the season started in September. We have frequent t-shirt sales (our main source of income) around campus along with bake sales. 

Our big effort was our Yule Ball, a campus wide dance that we hosted in January of this year. We provided wizard themed food and music for over 350 students and split the profits with USAAC, a local cancer research organization.

 

Where the Money Goes

Despite our great success in the past, we still receive NO funding from the University. As of now, we've been running fundraisers since September to help lessen the cost of the World Cup to our players. Unfortunately each of them is still paying $500 out of pocket to pay for transport, accomodations, food, and equipment.

If we were to meet our goal, we would be able to help lessen the total cost for all players. Additionally, some members aren't able to come because the event is simply too expensive. With enough of your support, we would be able to subsidize their trip even further, allowing them to participate!

Ideally we'll have enough money to give each needing member $100 to help them play the game they love. If we make more? Even more support for our players!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you're not financially able to contribute to our campaign at this time doesn't mean you can't still help out!

  • Like our facebook page (facebook.com/umichquidditch) and share it with your friends!
  • Follow us on twitter @umichquidditch.
  • Spread word of this campaign to everyone you know! Family, friends, Michigan Alums, pets, whoever!
  • Come see us in Ann Arbor! We play quite regularly (usually Sunday afternoons), so come by one week and say hi!

 

The Rest

Indiegogo provides great tools to share and promote your favorite campaigns and we'd love it if you'd use them for us.
 
Past that, drop us a line at umichquidditch@gmail.com with any questions and we'll get back to you before your owl could!
 
Also, if you pay using paypal, it will show the recipient as "David Brownman". That's because we're using a personal paypal rather than set up a team paypal for a oneshot thing. So, have no fear!

story:
MY STORY


While training for a marathon in Fort Worth in 2011, I suffered  terrible knee injury. I couldn't walk right for two days, and when I finally could, I was moving around with this huge sac of fluid behind my right knee. I thought my running days were over. 

Whenever I hit the pavement again, braving myself to attempt a run, my body reacted with pain. I thought my knee would never be the same. 

I met with physical therapists, and even an orthopedic surgeon. None of them could help. 

Then I tried DDPYoga. Now, like many of you guys out there, I always thought Yoga was this sort of hippy buddhist thing that rich people with problems hang out at. I was always a fan of intense workouts, and pushing myself in a fitness context. I tried DDPYoga after trying everything. Long story short-my knee is completely healed, I gained nearly ten pounds of pure muscle, and I run at least ten miles every week!


What the hell is DDPYoga?

DDPYoga is a fitness program designed by former professional wrestler, Diamond Dallas Page (3X WCW world Champion.) He was just like me. When he needed to rehab his back, he scoffed at the idea of doing yoga. But it healed his body and he was able to extend his career shortly after. 
He designed this program for regular guys, and gals. You can be a football player, or a mother of three, this program allows you to work with your own body, to reach your fitness goals, and OWN YOUR LIFE. 

Certification!

After 3 years of doing this program, I'm ready to start the process to becoming a certified DDPYoga instructor!


I'm offering free classes, for those who help contribute toward my certification dues. 


Thank you all for reading this and for contributing!!!


BANG!

story:
Unfortunately had an accident which resulted in torn ligaments and a blockade in my knee which in turn rendered me unable to walk!
 
As an entrepreneur living in Eastern Europe without insurance of any kind the procedure to repair my knee and get me back on my feet is very costly.

After this of course comes the hardship of rehabilitation.
Anyone who has been through any sort of medical procedures/surgery knows this process can be  extremely draining on morale as well as finances.

I am looking to raise money due to the significant cost that comes with surgery & rehabilitation time. 

Much love to you all any contribution would be greatly appreciated.

<3

story:
Whether you’re an independent senior, a disabled veteran living alone, or a person living with a loved one who is medically challenged, you can be struck with a perilous  event such as a heart attack, a stroke or a fall.  Being prepared for such a crisis can be the difference between life and death.

Having vital information in paramedics’ hands is absolutely critical to saving your life. That’s why we created Daily Companion; the first ‘TeleCare’ system designed to provide paramedics instant access to your vital health information… anywhere… anytime.

Join us in keeping people healthy, but also know when there's an emergency, that you helped saved their lives with Daily Companion!

What is Daily Companion™?


Daily Companion is a patented, all-in-one ‘TeleCare’ system that unites personalized daily healthcare applications with an advanced medical alert system to keep you safe and secure. 

Daily Companion was developed for the masses – A super-simple Home Base Station for our senior loved ones who are technology averse, and specialized mobile applications for iOS and Android phone users.  Each provides powerful features and applications that help promote and protect your daily life.

With the simple touch of the screen, there is immediate access to a suite of applications designed by those who know best… those with special needs.  Below are just some of these incredible applications:

Health and Well-being Applications

  • Time and calendar-based wellness and medication reminders
  • Brain challenging exercises
  • Global secure access to your personal health information
  • Registered ‘Nurse on Call’ to answer any of your healthcare questions

Emergency Response Applications

  • One-touch to Call Center from home base station or your smartphone
  • 24-hour emergency dispatch-trained assistants stay with you until help arrives
  • Instant access to your personal health information displayed for paramedics
  • Smartphone Med Alert apps with GPS tracking on your own phone
  • Text and Voice notifications sent to your loved ones of your emergency
  • Two-way voice communication from the home base station and smartphone
  • One-touch ‘Dial your Doc’ from our built-in Phone Book

And best of all Daily Companion’s Home Base Station performs all these incredible services over a standard telephone line! Simply plug the station into the AC power and telephone line and you’re ready to go. You don’t need to install or pay for Internet access making Daily Companion the ideal product for anyone on a fixed income!

Daily Companion’s medical alert system requires a low cost monthly subscription fee to provide you our world-class services including:
  • Access to our International Academy Emergency Dispatch (IAED) Assistant monitoring services 24/7
  • Quick dial to ‘Nurse on Call’ enabling you immediate access to registered nurses anytime… anywhere
  • Your Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) displayed for paramedics and emergency room doctor use
  • Time-based calendar presenting wellness and medication reminders
  • Daily brain challenging exercises to support mental growth and stability
  • Fax, email and voice out-call capability to your loved ones in an emergency

Subscription

Daily Companion includes a world-class level of healthcare and lifesaving services. To do this requires a modest monthly fee.  Our normal monthly subscription fee is $34.95 a month for the TeleCare system (home base station and smartphone combination).  But for our fantastic backers, we are offering the same system for only $19.95 a month!  That’s a savings of $180 a year!

Compare our services with other emergency alert systems and you’ll soon discover there’s no competition in price or level of services.

THE HOME BASE STATION – TECH REVIEW


Daily Companion Home Base Station

Daily Companion’s ‘TeleCare’ Home Base Station is composed of a microprocessor-based system, an LCD touch screen interface and audio system, an RF transmitter and receiver that communicates with a wristband or pendant transmitter to activate the call for emergency service if needed, a camera, removable memory stick that contains a copy of the senior’s health profile, and a website that is used as a portal to upload their calendar of daily reminders, personal and health-related information, daily “Today” brain challenging exercises, and other updates to the in-home device all through a standard telephone line.

MOBILE APPS – TECH REVIEW


Daily Companion’s TeleCare mobile apps are designed to operate on iPhone and Android phone systems. The system provides key elements of the Daily Companion Home Base Station including:

  • Access to our IAED-trained Assistant monitoring services 24/7
  • Push button ‘Nurse on Call’ enables immediate access to registered nurses
  • Your personal health profile displayed for emergency services
  • Time-based calendar presenting wellness and medication reminders
  • Capability to immediately ‘Update’ your CHIP database
  • Fax, email and text of emergency activation to your loved ones

SMART APPS: PROMOTE AND PROTECT YOUR HEALTH

Daily Companion’s suite of healthcare applications has been developed to provide our seniors with daily reminders and notifications to keep them healthy and safe.


Main TeleCare Screen
 

MY LIFE: PERSONAL CARE APPLICATIONS

My Life is the heart and soul of Daily Companion. It keeps you active and alert to your daily health requirements, while also providing critical health information to EMTs in the event of an emergency. Below are some of its important applications:
 

- Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) Application



The Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) stores and displays your vital health information on your Base Station and Smartphone for paramedics when a crisis arises. No longer do paramedics have to search the home for pill jars and health information. It’s right there in front of them! This special feature includes: (1) Personal Contact Information including your primary doctor, pharmacy and emergency contacts, (2) Medical History including recent health status, chronic diseases, illnesses, operations, and treatments, (3) Allergies and Reactions including immunizations, (4) Medications and prescriptions, and (5) Fax capability allowing paramedics to fax the information to the receiving hospital before you arrive.

- Wellness and Medical Reminder Application


'Remind' is the Wellness and Medication Reminder application. The application provides daily pop-up screens to help remind you of important daily wellness and medication events such as scheduled medication intake or performance, drink water, eat meals, snacks, walk dog, park visit and special events such as birthdays, anniversaries or doctor visits and many more.

- Nurse-On-Call application

Nurse on Call: For any questions about health, seniors can press a button and get instant access to a registered nurse who can help them with questions regarding their health.

Other applications included in My Life are: ‘Company’ contact information, and ‘I.D.’ the ability to leave your own personal message and snapshot for the CHIP.

The Emergency Communications System (ECS)

Daily Companion’s TeleCare System comes with an Emergency Communication System (ECS) that is second to none. The ECS is composed of three critically important healthcare applications: (1) The Call 911 to Call Center App and (2) the Emergency Notification System App and (3) the extractable CHIP memory stick.

- Call 911


By pressing the 911-button on the base station, wireless remote transmitter, or smartphone, you will receive immediate access to our Central Station where International Academy Emergency Dispatch-trained Daily Companion Assistants will help them with their crisis.

- Extractable CHIP Memory Stick


Extractable CHIP Memory Stick
 

The Home Base Station comes with a removable memory stick that contains your Critical Health Information Profile so that paramedics can transport your important health information to the receiving hospital even before you arrive.

- Emergency QR System

Daily Companion’s patent-pending emergency QR system allows paramedics, using their computer tablet and our specialized Quick Response Scanner Software, to instantly down your medical information from the Base Station or your Smartphone right onto their system enabling even quicker protocol response to your crisis. Here is how the system functions:


- Emergency Notification System

The Emergency Notification System works behind the scenes on from the Home Base Station or Smartphone. When the ECS system is activated, Daily Companion’s TeleCare system automatically places a call or text an alert message to those listed on your emergency notification list letting them know that your system has been activated. Here is an example of the voice message

OTHER FEATURED APPLICATIONS

Daily Companion’s TeleCare system provides an array of features designed to keep you involved with the world, these include:

- Today


'Today' provides the user daily-updated brain-challenging exercises. It’s important to keep your loved one’s brain active and engaged. That’s why we’ve incorporated a suite of daily (automatic) downloads of new stimulating exercises such as ‘Word’, ‘Inspirational Messages’, ‘Quotes’, ‘Trivia’, ‘Lottery Numbers’, ‘My Sign Horoscope’ and ‘History’. In the future, we plan on adding crossword puzzles, Sudoku, Solitare, and many others to help improve the mental health of our users.

- Phone Book


Phone Book and Dialer Screen
 

Phone Book is an application accessible on many pages is ‘Phone’, a system that includes an address book that is downloaded from the Daily Companion profile that you’ve created for your senior parent. With a touch of the face or name in the scrollable address book, the number is instantly dialed. When using the touch pad to dial a number, the number is announced for confirmation when touched.

- Inactivity Notification

As children of senior parents, we’re always concerned about the possibility of our parents having a stroke and no one is there to help them. Sometimes seniors don’t get help for days… often ending in a bad situation. Well, not any more. Daily Companion’s TeleCare system provides the capability to monitor and report the ‘inactivity’ of the user. The account holder can select a 24, 36 or 48 hour observation and can be notified of non-use. Just one more way Daily Companion ensures the health and safety of the ones we love.

PERSONALIZE YOUR DAILY COMPANION!

To make the Daily Companion your personal friend, you’ll go to Daily Companion’s website and create their own Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) and reminder schedule. Our intuitive wizard, using simple drop down menus, guides you through the steps to create their personal profile.


 

With a push of the ‘Update’ button, all the information is sent to the Home Base Station via a simple telephone line or directly to your smartphone, now making it your own personalized companion.

WHAT YOU DO HERE …REMINDS YOU HERE!


 

THE TEAM


Tom Conroy – The Inventor of Daily Companion
Retired USAF Officer
 

As a U.S. Air Force Officer, I had the opportunity to design and develop technologically advanced systems for our national defense space program.  Our goal was and will always be to protect our citizens by providing the highest level of security from space. It was a ‘calling’ to duty then, and it is a calling now to help our seniors, our parents and friends live safe and secure lives… without fear.

But as a project manager, I know what it takes to produce Daily Companion. It takes a team. I’m fortunate to have found seasoned veterans, such as our Chairman Philip Verruto and CEO Gordon Krass, to help direct our world class group of hardware manufacturers and software engineers; all with years of experience in producing medical devices. These talented, passionate, and motivated people are dedicated to getting this amazing product in your hands on time, with the highest level of quality.

Our team is honored to support several disabled veterans organizations. A percentage of rewards will go toward the purchase of units, with no monthly fees, to those who desperately need Daily Companion to help them with their daily lives. It’s our way of honoring the sacrifice they’ve given to our families, friends, and country.

YOUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTION

We’re serious about making this important technology available to every senior in the country and throughout the world. Your contribution is going to allow us to prepare for mass production.  Basically, your contribution will:

- Take advantage of mass-producing our system by purchasing our materials at discounted rates, thereby making Daily Companion even more affordable!

- Continue to develop really cool new applications for our senior parents and those who are medically or physically challenged

- Allow us to market and sell Daily Companion regionally then eventually throughout the United States. Once established here, we will move toward the international market.

Our goal is to deliver your Home Base Stations 60 days after the close of our campaign.

PAYING IT FORWARD

By contributing to this campaign, you will also be “paying it forward.” It’s a fact that today many of our elderly, and health-challenged, can’t afford necessities like this life-saving technology. Because of you, we will be able to make more Daily Companions available at little or no cost -- and for that you will have the heart-felt gratitude of many.

FAQ

How can I order a Daily Companion Home Healthcare and Medical Alert System?
You can only get one now through our Indiegogo page. Our Indiegogo backers will be the first to receive the Daily Companion and will be saving a lot of money over the regular retail price of $399 plus $34.95 monthly service fees.

Can I order more than one?
You can definitely pre-order as many Daily Companions as you wish. Just increase your favorite pledge by as many additional Daily Companions you want or select one of the multiple Daily Companion reward pledges and get several from 2 to 10. Protect the health and well being of all your elder folks!

Can I pick a color when I order?
Right now, the Daily Companion only comes in one off white color but that’s a cool suggestion. Thanks.

How can I order a Daily Companion App for my iPhone?
You can only get a Daily Companion Smartphone App now from our Indiegogo page. Select one of the pledges that include a Smartphone App and help save the life of an elderly loved one and keep the App for yourself.

Does the Daily Companion App work on an Android Smartphone too?
Absolutely! Daily Companion Apps are OK for both iPhone and Android phones.

Does the Daily Companion have a battery backup in case of a power failure?
Absolutely. This is important to keep your elderly loved one safe during power outages.

How long does the battery last?
Fully charged batteries last a minimum of 2 hours.

Can the battery be recharged?
Daily Companion batteries are constantly being recharged as long as the base station is plugged in to a power outlet.

Is there a warranty on the Daily Companion?
Yes, your Daily Companion carries a 5-year full replacement warranty.

Does a Daily Companion require a phone line?
Yes. To assure the absolute highest level of call completion, a landline is required. This can be regular phone service from your local phone provider of a VoIP service from an alternate provider of cable company.

When can I expect to receive my Daily Companion reward?
The Daily Companion system rewards will begin shipment 60 days after the close of our campaign. All other rewards will be shipped 30 days after campaign close.

Are there monthly service fees with a Daily Companion?
Yes. At retail, a Daily Companion subscription will include a charge for the base station (regular $399) and a monthly service fee ($34.95) to support connectivity to the Central Station emergency call center as well as special service features like Nurse on Call 24/7 and web site for updating critical health information and other neat applications.

Are there any of these monthly fees required in addition to the reward?
That depends on the reward. Some rewards have no monthly fees for life. Others have anywhere from one to a full year of no monthly fees. Check out the reward descriptions and select the one that best suits your circumstance. You can give a completely free for life Daily Companion to a dear loved one.

Can I designate multiple rewards to go to other folks?
Yes, and you can prepay any monthly service fees that may be associated with that reward.

24-hour emergency dispatch-trained assistants stay with you until help arrives
Instant access to your personal health information displayed for paramedics
Smartphone Med Alert apps with GPS tracking on your own phone
Text and Voice notifications sent to your loved ones of your emergency
Two-way voice communication from the home base station and smartphone
One-touch ‘Dial your Doc’ from our built-in Phone Book

And best of all Daily Companion’s Home Base Station performs all these incredible services over a standard telephone line!  Simply plug the station into the AC power and telephone line and you’re ready to go. You don’t need to install or pay for Internet access making Daily Companion the ideal product for anyone on a fixed income!Daily Companion’s medical alert system requires a low cost monthly subscription fee to provide you our world-class services including:

Access to our International Academy Emergency Dispatch (IAED) Assistant monitoring services 24/7
Quick dial to ‘Nurse on Call’ enabling you immediate access to registered nurses anytime… anywhere
Your Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) displayed for paramedics and emergency room doctor use
Time-based calendar presenting wellness and medication reminders
Daily brain challenging exercises to support mental growth and stability
Fax, email and voice out-call capability to your loved ones in an emergency

Subscription
Daily Companion includes a world-class level of healthcare and lifesaving
services. To do this requires a modest
monthly fee.  Our normal monthly
subscription fee is $34.95 a month for the TeleCare system (home base station
and smartphone combination).  But for our
fantastic backers, we are offering the same system for only $19.95 a
month!  That’s a savings of $180 a year!
Compare our services with other emergency alert systems and you’ll soon discover there’s no competition in price or level of services.
THE HOME BASE STATION – TECH REVIEW

Daily Companion Home Base Station

Daily Companion’s ‘TeleCare’ Home Base Station is composed of a microprocessor-based system, an LCD touch screen interface and audio system, an RF transmitter and receiver that communicates with a wristband or pendant transmitter to activate the call for emergency service if needed, a camera, removable memory stick that contains a copy of the senior’s health profile, and a website that is used as a portal to upload their calendar of daily reminders, personal and health-related information, daily “Today” brain challenging exercises, and other updates to the in-home device all through a standard telephone line.
MOBILE APPS – TECH REVIEW



Daily Companion’s TeleCare mobile apps are designed to operate on iPhone and Android phone systems.  The system provides key elements of the Daily Companion Home Base Station including:

Access to our IAED-trained Assistant monitoring services 24/7
Push button ‘Nurse on Call’ enables immediate access to registered nurses 
Your personal health profile displayed for emergency services
Time-based calendar presenting wellness and medication reminders
Capability to immediately ‘Update’ your CHIP database 
Fax, email and text of emergency activation to your loved ones

SMART APPS:  PROMOTE AND PROTECT YOUR HEALTH
Daily Companion’s suite of healthcare applications has been developed to provide our seniors with daily reminders and notifications to keep them healthy and safe.

Main TeleCare Screen 

MY LIFE:  PERSONAL CARE APPLICATIONS


My Life is the heart and soul of Daily Companion.  It keeps you active and alert to your daily health requirements, while also providing critical health information to EMTs in the event of an emergency.  Below are some of its important applications: 

- Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) Application




The Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) stores and displays your vital health information on your Base Station and Smartphone for paramedics when a crisis arises.  No longer do paramedics have to search the home for pill jars and health information.  It’s right there in front of them!  This special feature includes:  (1) Personal Contact Information including your primary doctor, pharmacy and emergency contacts, (2) Medical History including recent health status, chronic diseases, illnesses, operations, and treatments, (3) Allergies and Reactions including immunizations, (4) Medications and prescriptions, and (5) Fax capability allowing paramedics to fax the information to the receiving hospital before you arrive.
- Wellness and Medical Reminder Application

 

'Remind' is the Wellness and Medication Reminder application.  The application provides daily pop-up screens to help remind you of important daily wellness and medication events such as scheduled medication intake or performance, drink water, eat meals, snacks, walk dog, park visit and special events such as birthdays, anniversaries or doctor visits and many more.  
- Nurse-On-Call application

Nurse on Call:  For any questions about health, seniors can press a button and get instant access to a registered nurse who can help them with questions regarding their health.
Other applications included in My Life are: ‘Company’ contact information, and ‘I.D.’ the ability to leave your own personal message and snapshot for the CHIP.

The Emergency Communications System (ECS)
Daily Companion’s TeleCare System comes with an Emergency Communication System (ECS) that is second to none.  The ECS is composed of three critically important healthcare applications: (1) The Call 911 to Call Center App and (2) the Emergency Notification System App and (3) the extractable CHIP memory stick.
- Call 911



By pressing the 911-button on the base station, wireless remote transmitter, or smartphone, you will receive immediate access to our Central Station where International Academy Emergency Dispatch-trained Daily Companion Assistants will help them with their crisis.
- Extractable CHIP Memory Stick

Extractable CHIP Memory Stick 
The Home Base Station comes with a removable memory stick that contains your Critical Health Information Profile so that paramedics can transport your important health information to the receiving hospital even before you arrive.
-  Emergency QR System
Daily Companion’s patent-pending emergency QR system allows paramedics, using their computer tablet and our specialized Quick Response Scanner Software, to instantly down your medical information from the Base Station or your Smartphone right onto their system enabling even quicker protocol response to your crisis.  Here is how the system functions:



- Emergency Notification System

The Emergency Notification System works behind the scenes on from the Home Base Station or Smartphone.  When the ECS system is activated, Daily Companion’s TeleCare system automatically places a call or text an alert message to those listed on your emergency notification list letting them know that your system has been activated.  Here is an example of the voice messageOTHER FEATURED APPLICATIONS
Daily Companion’s TeleCare system provides an array of features designed to keep you involved with the world, these include:
- Today



'Today' provides the user daily-updated brain-challenging exercises.  It’s important to keep your loved one’s brain active and engaged.  That’s why we’ve incorporated a suite of daily (automatic) downloads of new stimulating exercises such as ‘Word’, ‘Inspirational Messages’, ‘Quotes’, ‘Trivia’, ‘Lottery Numbers’, ‘My Sign Horoscope’ and ‘History’.  In the future, we plan on adding crossword puzzles, Sudoku, Solitare, and many others to help improve the mental health of our users.
- Phone Book


Phone Book and Dialer Screen 
Phone Book is an application accessible on many pages is ‘Phone’, a system that includes an address book that is downloaded from the Daily Companion profile that you’ve created for your senior parent.  With a touch of the face or name in the scrollable address book, the number is instantly dialed. When using the touch pad to dial a number, the number is announced for confirmation when touched.
- Inactivity Notification
As children of senior parents, we’re always concerned about the possibility of our parents having a stroke and no one is there to help them.  Sometimes seniors don’t get help for days… often ending in a bad situation.  Well, not any more.  Daily Companion’s TeleCare system provides the capability to monitor and report the ‘inactivity’ of the user.  The account holder can select a 24, 36 or 48 hour observation and can be notified of non-use.  Just one more way Daily Companion ensures the health and safety of the ones we love. 
PERSONALIZE YOUR DAILY COMPANION!
To make the Daily Companion your personal friend, you’ll go to Daily Companion’s website and create their own Critical Health Information Profile (CHIP) and reminder schedule.  Our intuitive wizard, using simple drop down menus, guides you through the steps to create their personal profile.

 

With a push of the ‘Update’ button, all the information is sent to the Home Base Station via a simple telephone line or directly to your smartphone, now making it your own personalized companion.

WHAT YOU DO HERE …REMINDS YOU HERE!
 


THE TEAM
 Tom Conroy – The Inventor of Daily CompanionRetired
USAF Officer 
As a U.S. Air Force Officer, I had the opportunity to design and develop technologically advanced systems for our national defense space program.  Our goal was and will always be to protect our citizens by providing the highest level of security from space. It was a ‘calling’ to duty then, and it is a calling now to help our seniors, our parents and friends live safe and secure
lives… without fear.
But as a project manager, I know what it takes to produce Daily Companion. It takes a team. I’m fortunate to have found seasoned veterans, such as our Chairman Philip Verruto and CEO Gordon Krass, to help direct our world class group of hardware manufacturers and software engineers; all with years of experience in producing medical devices. These talented, passionate, and motivated people are dedicated to getting this amazing product in your hands on time, with the highest level of quality.
Our team is honored to support several disabled veterans organizations.   A percentage of rewards will go toward the purchase of units, with no monthly fees, to those who desperately need Daily Companion to help them with their daily lives.  It’s our way of honoring the sacrifice they’ve given to our families, friends, and country.
YOUR INDIEGOGO CONTRIBUTION
We’re serious about making this important technology available to every senior in the country and throughout the world. Your contribution is going to allow us to prepare for mass production.  Basically, your contribution will:
 - Take advantage of mass-producing our system by purchasing our materials at discounted rates, thereby making Daily Companion even more affordable!
 - Continue to develop really cool new applications for our senior parents and those who are medically or physically challenged
 - Allow us to market and sell Daily Companion regionally then eventually throughout the United States. Once established here, we will move toward the international market.
Our goal is to deliver your Home Base Stations 60 days after the close of our campaign. 
PAYING IT FORWARD
By contributing to this campaign, you will also be “paying it forward.” It’s a fact that today many of our elderly, and health-challenged, can’t afford necessities like this life-saving technology. Because of you, we will be able to make more Daily Companions available at little or no cost -- and for that you will have the heart-felt gratitude of many.

FAQ
How can I order a Daily Companion Home Healthcare and Medical Alert System?You can only get one now through our Indiegogo page. Our Indiegogo backers will be the first to receive the Daily Companion and will be saving a lot of money over the regular retail price of $399 plus $34.95 monthly service fees.
Can I order more than one?
You can definitely pre-order as many Daily Companions as you wish.  Just increase your favorite pledge by as many additional Daily Companions you want or select one of the multiple Daily Companion reward pledges and get several from 2 to 10. Protect the health and well being of all your elder folks!
Can I pick a color when I order?Right now, the Daily Companion only comes in one off white color but that’s a cool suggestion. Thanks.
How can I order a Daily Companion App for my iPhone?You can only get a Daily Companion Smartphone App now from our Indiegogo  page. Select one of the pledges that include a Smartphone App and help save the life of an elderly loved one and keep the App for yourself.
Does the Daily Companion App work on an Android Smartphone too?Absolutely! Daily Companion Apps are OK for both iPhone and Android phones.


Does the Daily Companion have a battery backup in case of a power failure?Absolutely. This is important to keep your elderly loved one safe during power outages.
How long does the battery last?Fully charged batteries last a minimum of 2 hours.
Can the battery be recharged?Daily Companion batteries are constantly being recharged as long as the base station is plugged in to a power outlet.
Is there a warranty on the Daily Companion?Yes, your Daily Companion carries a 5-year full replacement warranty.
Does a Daily Companion require a phone line?Yes. To assure the absolute highest level of call completion, a landline is required. This can be regular phone service from your local phone provider of a VoIP service from an alternate provider of cable company.
When can I expect to receive my Daily Companion reward?The Daily Companion system rewards will begin shipment 60 days after the close of our campaign. All other rewards will be shipped 30 days after campaign close. 
Are there monthly service fees with a Daily Companion?Yes. At retail, a Daily Companion subscription will include a charge for the base station (regular $399) and a monthly service fee ($34.95) to support connectivity to the Central Station emergency call center as well as special service features like Nurse on Call 24/7 and web site for updating critical health information and other neat applications.
Are there any of these monthly fees required in addition to the reward?That depends on the reward. Some rewards have no monthly fees for life. Others have anywhere from one to a full year of no monthly fees. Check out the reward descriptions and select the one that best suits your circumstance. You can give a completely free for life Daily Companion to a dear loved one.
Can I designate multiple rewards to go to other folks?Yes, and you can prepay any monthly service fees that may be associated with that reward.

story:
The ilink T2 Fitness Band

(No matter this campaign achieve our goal or not, you will get the band on Auguest!)

The birth of the ilink T2 Fitness Band is the inevitable outcome of society's development. With a sedentary lifestyle becoming the nowadays, our health is suffering and our sleep quality is poor. Seeing the general decline of healthfulness around us, we set out to develop a product to help people live healthier lifestyles through the use of technology. The ilink T2 Fitness Band is the outcome of that desire, using the best of information technology to improve your health. Our aim is that the device becomes your life-long health companion, leading you on a path to wellness.

  

Activity tracking

The ilink T2 Fitness Band records in real time the precise number of steps taken and calories burned, both of which are visible when you raise your hand to look at the band. 

Sleep monitoring

The band provides automatic sleep monitoring to give you accurate statistics about your sleep quality. 

It also features an in-built vibrating alarm to gently wake you at the time you set – without the shock of a loud noise!

Call Alerts

Often muffled by a loud environment or by being deep inside a bag, it's very common to miss phone calls when out and about. With the SAI T2 Fitness Band, you don't need to worry about that happening again. The band displays call notifications, text messages and social media notifications at a receiving distance of up to 10 metres. 

Low power consumption, long standby time

The ilink T2 Fitness Band has a battery life up to more than two weeks – much longer than some of the leading smart fitness bands on the marker. Low battery? The band is fully charged within 120 minutes.

As you can see in the instructions below, charging is a breeze!


Waterproof and dustproof

With IPX6 waterproofing, the ilink T2 Fitness Band is guaranteed to withstand splashing. The band is also dustproof. Feel free to wash your face, brush your teeth, wash your hands and not worry about water damage, but it's not recommended you wear the band in heavy rain or while swimming.

Air upgrades and data synchronisation

Easy and convenient to operate, the button-free device means you simply need to tap to toggle between screens. The band synchronises your data wirelessly and can also support air firmware upgrades.

The band's associated app stores your exercise and sleep data history for up to a week, meaning you can easily view your statistics on your phone within that time. The app is supported on both Android and iOS devices.

Scan the QR code to download the app.

Six stylish colors

The ilink T2 Fitness Band is available in a variety of fashionable colors for you to choose from. There's one to suit everyone!

How the funds will be used

The funds raised through this campaign will be used for further improving the product now and its future generations, including new health functions such as heart rate detection. We will also improve the packaging design.


Project schedule

 

Contact us

Tel: +86 755-28287617
E-mail: nick@ilinkworld.us

CellPhone: +86 13691672981


Project Team

 ilink Tech Industrial Co., is composed of 80 members after the formation of a young, innovative and high technology companies. Company members have a wealth of product development and production experience in the smart dressed industry were among the first to participate in research and design of a group of young engineers. Companies adhering to the "professionalism, innovation, integrity" business philosophy, is committed to intelligent hardware product development and production and marketing. We are committed to improving your health Living with IT and data services.

story:
Love your body, love the earth.

My dream and plan is to bring a very special high quality natural formula hair product line to the mainstream salon market.   

My name is Catherine Smith.  I have 20+ years experience in business management, and 11+ years combined in Natural Health & Beauty, and Marketing & Design.  I am passionate about healthy clean eating and living, and keeping in tune with nature. 

My Strengths

I have big dreams, am motivated, have a strong work ethic, and am rather ambitious!   I am a manager and I am a very professional person.  With your contribution, I can launch my dream company of a luxurious natural hair products line to the world.  I have formulas ready to go for 3 products (shampoo, conditioner, and a leave-in serum) that will better the lives of millions, and bring a natural premium needed product to the market.  

I will also be adding a men's hair line ("blu" in the photos), and a hair pomade at a later date.  Ingredients are the source of the quality, and the careful alchemy of mixing the formulas.  I am passionate about these formulas and the key ingredients (which I cannot say for fear of someone else taking my idea)!  Suffice it to say that they are fabulous!  

I am realistic.  There are a few companies that have a similar product, but none that are clean enough (too many chemicals), or they have bad impractical packaging, or they are difficult to dispense!  With my formula, practical, effective, natural, and my mission is, and always will be, to remain clean.  I also plan to have the very best modern clean marketing campaign.   

Please visit:  www.arganiix.com

In addition to being the best possible role model I can be, I want my daughter to grow up in a world where chemical isn't the "norm," and her world isn't filled with toxins.  


I need you to help me reach this goal!

The funds I am hoping to raise will go directly to the ingredients purchase, formula multiplying, bottling design and manufacture, logistical components, marketing, hiring whomever necessary to help, as well as fund trade show representation.    

I have already worked out all ingredients, working on sourcing, formulas, bottling/packaging, marketing, bought domains, created logos, and know my market!  I know my customer base, and how to reach them.  I just need YOU to help me get to the grand scale I need to launch into this coveted market.  


My niche is unique, and I intend to explode into the market and wow everyone with my own story of health, how to achieve natural beauty that radiates from within, and how to get the best hair without the use of chemicals!    

If I don't receive the entirety of the funds I am seeking for the big launch, I will sell my house to get closer to the funding I need, and launch into a smaller scale, combined with your generous contribution, I believe I can really cause a stir in the market!  

I know the amount I am asking for seems daunting, however the bottle design die alone is $30K!  I will start out with using pre-mades, until I get it off the ground, then probably opt for the custom bottles.   The ingredients I have chosen are premium.  I have not skimped in my recipes.  These are simply the best on the market.  To be set up for bulk mixing, there is a considerable payout.

    The Impact you will have on me and my mission:

    I am confident of my abilities, and having your support would make it so much sweeter and more attainable, and would help things move forward more efficiently.  I wouldn't have to worry as finances as much.   I want the world to have these products!

    I have experience with all aspects of business: accounting, taxes, reconciliation, budgeting, buying, general management, payroll, hiring, working with a Board of Directors, human resources, marketing, copy writing, art, merchandizing, marketing, design, packaging, etc.   As a hobbiest nutritionist, and health & nature guru, I wish to marry all my talents into one, to find myself onto the path that nature intended for me, no pun intended. 

    You can help!  

      Risks & Challenges

      The biggest hurdle I have is financial.  I cannot afford to purchase the ingredients in bulk, get them formula'd, mixed in batch quantity, bottled, printed, packaged, boxed, make the samples I need to distribute, and get myself to the trade shows, so get this off the ground and get the products into the potential dealers.  I know my strengths and weaknesses.  I know I will need help to make this come true, not just from you as a potential contributor, but also other professionals.   I know I will need the help from a chemist soon for formulaic issues, and someone to assist with logistical and shipping challenges, for instance.

      You should also know that I am also enrolled in graduate school - my major is Design Strategy and Innovation.   I start this part time at the beginning of 2015.   Juggling this with the business launch could be a balancing act, but I am not a stranger to being in school and working full time, so I am up for the task.  If homework begins to interfere, I will take off a few semesters while things get going, because this is my priority, although I long for the skills I will learn at the Master's level at the University!  I would like this business venture to be my full time job.  Believe me, I plan to work overtime and weekends to get it done right.  I also will not launch until it is the proper time.

        Other Ways You Can Help

        Even if you can't afford to contribute, if you could please share my campaign with others, that would be amazing!  I really appreciate any little thing that anyone can do to help me.  I would sincerely appreciate your support!

        Also, if you can help by sharing my story, please use the Indiegogo share tools and share me on Facebook!
